page_visual_description: The page primarily contains textual information with a focus on modifications and machine configurations. The top section includes a bold header 'READ THIS FIRST' followed by a subsection titled 'Modifications' in bold, emphasizing compliance with industry standards. Below, the 'Machine Configuration' section describes two configurations, ULS and LS, with bullet points. A prominent diagram on the lower half of the page illustrates a machine with a callout indicating the Ultra Low Sulfur Fuel Decal. The page is structured with clear sections and a visual emphasis on the diagram, which is labeled as figure-4-1.

content_elements.title: Machine Configuration with Ultra Low Sulfur Fuel Decal
content_elements.summary: The diagram illustrates the location of the Ultra Low Sulfur Fuel decal on a machine, indicating compliance with specific fuel requirements. It distinguishes between Ultra Low Sulfur and Low Sulfur configurations.
warnings: Modifications must be approved by JLG.

related_text_blocks.label: textblock-4-1
related_text_blocks.description: Text block explaining the machine configurations and compliance requirements.

content_elements.natural_description: The diagram shows a side view of a machine with a focus on the placement of the Ultra Low Sulfur Fuel decal. The machine is depicted with large wheels and a cabin, and the decal is highlighted with a callout labeled '1'. The decal reads 'ULTRA LOW SULFUR DIESEL FUEL ONLY S < 15 mg/kg' and includes an icon of an open book, suggesting reference to a manual. The diagram is labeled 'MD0090' in the bottom right corner, indicating its reference number.

content_elements.title: Modifications and Machine Configuration
content_elements.summary: Details on how modifications may affect compliance and the distinction between Ultra Low Sulfur and Low Sulfur configurations.
warnings: Any modification must be approved by JLG.

related_figures.label: figure-4-1
related_figures.description: Diagram illustrating the Ultra Low Sulfur Fuel Decal location.
